alert.note: Alert for Cullman; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cullman and southwestern Morgan Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles northeast of Smith Dam, or 10 miles east of Arley, moving east northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches in less than an hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Hanceville, Good Hope, Dodge City, Baldwin, Vinemont, West Point, Garden City, Phelan and Wilburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
